input:
On the floor, you see a set of things arranged in a row: a grey cup, a pink notebook, a silver booklet, a burgundy pencil, a magenta teddy bear, and a turquoise pen. What is the color of the left-most thing?
Options:
(A) red
(B) orange
(C) yellow
(D) green
(E) blue
(F) brown
(G) magenta
(H) fuchsia
(I) mauve
(J) teal
(K) turquoise
(L) burgundy
(M) silver
(N) gold
(O) black
(P) grey
(Q) purple
(R) pink
